channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 阿里巴巴领投了中国人工智能初创企业最大的一轮融资，这是阿里巴巴一连串大手笔投资中的最新一笔，表明这家电子商务公司正再次部署资金以寻求增长
item.description:
Alibaba led the largest single financing round for a Chinese AI startup, the latest in a string of sizeable investments that suggest the e-commerce firm is again deploying capital in the hunt for growth https://t.co/6rd2ri7ns6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 瑞穗银行本月在孟买豪华的瑞吉酒店展示了其商业关系，突显了其在印度日益增长的立足点。
item.description:
Mizuho’s showcase of its business ties at Mumbai’s luxury St Regis hotel this month underscores its growing foothold in India, a market that has lately been endorsed by Wall Street giants https://t.co/0TRbScXe6W

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在欧洲开始新的一天需要知道的五件事
item.description:
Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe https://t.co/2eHKt7MyWx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统表示希望谈判人员能尽快使以色列和哈马斯在加沙地带的战斗暂时停止，并称停火最快可能在下周一开始。
item.description:
President Joe Biden expresses hope that negotiators will soon secure a temporary pause in the fighting between Israel and Hamas in the Gaza Strip, saying that a cease-fire could begin as soon as next Monday https://t.co/y3wG5c62YF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Make UK 首席执行官斯蒂芬-菲普森（Stephen Phipson）呼吁改变资本支出规则，并建议如果财政部反对，则应将其拆分
item.description:
Make UK CEO Stephen Phipson called for rules on capital spending to be changed, suggesting that if the Treasury objects, it should be split https://t.co/7whOjbkOHQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 利奥汽车股价在香港飙升，因为乐观的财报显示这家电动汽车制造商在竞争激烈的中国市场大有可为
item.description:
Li Auto shares soar in Hong Kong after upbeat earnings showed the electric-vehicle maker is showing promise in China’s hyper-competitive market https://t.co/NvvTeuwYYr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：@MumbiGitau 写道，一部追踪可可豆原产地的新法律有可能使巧克力、护肤品和草药的价格大跌。
item.description:
NEW: A new law tracing the origin of cocoa beans threatens to jolt the prices of chocolate, skin-care products and herbal medicines, writes @MumbiGitau https://t.co/fPUzbLvXMe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 匈牙利准备再次降低欧盟最高的借贷成本，尽管本国货币徘徊在四个月低点附近，但政策制定者可能会加快宽松步伐
item.description:
Hungary is poised to lower the highest borrowing costs in the European Union again, with policymakers potentially accelerating the pace of easing despite the national currency hovering near a four-month low https://t.co/5OcK3bRClS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 本月，对美国商业房地产的担忧激怒了德国银行，但他们发出的信息很明确：别担心，我们的绝大部分房地产风险都在国内
item.description:
As fears about US commercial real estate roiled German banks this month, their message was clear: don’t worry, the vast majority of our property exposure is domestic https://t.co/CtpmHQgDAY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 追溯可可豆原产地的新法律有可能使巧克力、护肤品和草药的价格大跌，@MumbiGitau 写道
item.description:
A new law tracing the origin of cocoa beans threatens to jolt the prices of chocolate, skin-care products and herbal medicines, writes @MumbiGitau https://t.co/1XcFCVrxDN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，印度和阿曼即将完成贸易协议谈判，这将使双方的商品和服务更容易进入对方市场
item.description:
India and Oman are close to concluding talks on a trade deal that will allow easier access of goods and services into each other’s markets, sources say https://t.co/STDPk3E6Kr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚最大的液化天然气出口商伍德赛德公司（Woodside）预计，由于亚洲发展中国家的强劲增长，未来十年这种燃料的消费量将增长 50%。
item.description:
Australia’s biggest liquefied natural gas exporter, Woodside, expects consumption of the fuel to rise 50% over the next decade amid strong growth from Asia’s developing nations https://t.co/USfN2TPoX0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚央行称林吉特价值被低估，鉴于该国经济前景乐观，林吉特汇率应该走高
item.description:
Malaysia’s central bank says the ringgit is undervalued and should trade higher given the nation’s positive economic outlook https://t.co/JwLxZiFer2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Expedia 在本月初宣布领导层换届后，将在全球范围内裁员约 1,500 人。
item.description:
Expedia is eliminating about 1,500 jobs across the globe after announcing a leadership transition earlier this month https://t.co/pnCPU8e1ZH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 得益于股票奖励，Broadcom 首席执行官 Hock Tan 的薪酬翻了一番多，达到 1.618 亿美元
item.description:
Broadcom CEO Hock Tan's pay more than doubles to $161.8 million, thanks to a stock award https://t.co/EOYp40wR8P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 得益于股票奖励，Broadcom 首席执行官 Hock Tan 的薪酬翻了一番多，达到 1.618 亿美元
item.description:
Broadcom CEO Hock Tan's pay more than doubles to $161.8 million, thanks to a stock award https://t.co/KaU1xfKoFD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚前总理斯科特-莫里森（Scott Morrison）在澳大利亚议会发表最后一次讲话时批评中国，他的继任者面临着改善与中国政府关系这一日益艰巨的任务。
item.description:
Former Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison uses his final speech before the nation’s parliament to criticize China as his successor faces an increasingly challenging task of improving ties with Beijing https://t.co/37UJsmkNPC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据《南华早报》报道，中国负责香港事务的最高官员表示，"一国两制 "的治港方针将作为 "永久特色 "予以保留。
item.description:
China’s top official in charge of Hong Kong said the city’s governing principle of “one country, two systems” will be kept as a “permanent feature,” the SCMP reported https://t.co/bRscq7l4JJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在收到包括收购公司在内的收购者的收购意向后，Samsonite 正在考虑各种方案
item.description:
Samsonite is considering options after receiving takeover interest from suitors including buyout firms https://t.co/UXdojPG2MX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 快速时尚巨头 Shein 正在考虑将其梦寐以求的首次公开募股（IPO）从纽约转到伦敦的可能性，因为在美国上市会遇到重重障碍。@crystalttc 报道
item.description:
Fast-fashion giant Shein is considering the possibility of switching its coveted IPO to London from New York because of hurdles to the listing in the US. @crystalttc reports https://t.co/mxUPv1meCk pic.twitter.com/bDFZbQTH3Z

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据瑞银集团（UBS）估计，中国的国家支持基金今年已向在岸股票投入超过 570 亿美元，以支撑市场。
item.description:
China’s state-backed funds have poured more than $57 billion into onshore shares this year in a bid to prop up the market, according to UBS estimates https://t.co/dWIOCTtsum

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 香港遍布着一些小商店，它们在现金和加密货币之间进行转换，几乎不问任何问题，这是对这座城市自由奔放的过去的现代回响。不久之后，许多小店可能会在迫在眉睫的打压下关闭。@Suvajourno 报道
item.description:
Dotted across Hong Kong are small shops that convert between cash and crypto with few questions asked, a modern-day echo of the city’s freewheeling past.

Soon, many may shut under a looming crackdown. @Suvajourno reports https://t.co/oxTwyJ6iYi pic.twitter.com/yKhWxtinFz

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 27, 2024

item.title: 日本两年期国债收益率攀升至 2011 年以来的最高水平，越来越多的人猜测日本央行将在未来几个月内放弃负利率政策
item.description:
Japan’s two-year bond yield climbed to the highest level since 2011 with growing speculation the central bank will abandon its negative-interest-rate policy in coming months https://t.co/YLJgGFPYtm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 贝莱德称日本股市可 "创历史新高"
item.description:
BlackRock says Japanese stocks can “best their all-time highs” https://t.co/4bFDR5KYJP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息比特币自 2021 年底以来首次突破 55000 美元，投资者向 ETF 净投入 56 亿美元
item.description:
JUST IN: Bitcoin tops $55,000 for the first time since late 2021, as investors pour a net $5.6 billion into ETFs https://t.co/Qhghyqtplo pic.twitter.com/UAPCupKT6u

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 巴基斯坦立法者将于 2 月 29 日举行会议选举总理，前总理谢赫巴兹-谢里夫（Shehbaz Sharif）有望接任总理一职，因为他所在的政党组成了一个联盟，将被监禁的领导人伊姆兰-汗（Imran Khan）的组织拒之门外。
item.description:
Pakistan’s lawmakers will meet on February 29 to elect a prime minister with former premier Shehbaz Sharif expected to take the job after his party formed a coalition to shut out jailed leader Imran Khan’s group https://t.co/BAboDUjVA1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据巴尔干国家称，中国领导人习近平将于 2024 年访问塞尔维亚。
item.description:
Chinese leader Xi Jinping will visit Serbia in 2024, according to the Balkan nation, as Beijing’s broader relationship with Europe frays over trade disputes and the war in Ukraine https://t.co/QLub1Pzt55

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 比特币自 2021 年底以来首次突破 55,000 美元
item.description:
Bitcoin tops $55,000 for the first time since late 2021 https://t.co/I6DQ7MeUSf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024
